v - t - e The development of **Singapore's Chinese characters** can be divided into three periods. ## History Before 1969, [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) used [traditional Chinese characters](/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_characters). From 1969, the [Ministry of Education](/wiki/Ministry_of_Education_(Singapore)) promulgated the *Table of Simplified Characters* ([simplified Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 简体字表; [traditional Chinese](/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_characters): 簡體字表; [pinyin](/wiki/Pinyin): *jiǎntǐzì biǎo*), which differed from the [Chinese Character Simplification Scheme](/wiki/Chinese_Character_Simplification_Scheme) of the People's Republic of [China](/wiki/China). After 1976, Singapore fully adopted the [simplified Chinese characters](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters) of the [People's Republic of China](/wiki/People%27s_Republic_of_China). In 1977, the [second attempt to simplify the characters](/wiki/Second_round_of_simplified_Chinese_characters) was stopped, ending the long period of confusion associated with simplification. ## 1969 Table of Simplified Characters The 1969 *Table of Simplified Characters* was also known as the "502 Table of Simplified Characters" or simply "502". This table listed a total of 502 commonly used Simplified Characters. It contains 11 characters unique to Singapore, 38 characters simplified in different ways compared to that of [mainland China](/wiki/Mainland_China), and 29 characters whose left or right radical were not simplified. Simplification examples are as follows: - 要 → 𡚩 - 信 → 伩 - 窗 → 囪 - 貌 → 皃 - 嘴 → 咀 - 留 → 畄 - 答 → 荅 - 覆 → 覄 - 算 → 祘 - 解 → 觧 - 剎 → 杀 Different ways of simplification as compared to those of mainland China - 槟 → 梹 - 拨 → 𫝼 - 场 → 㘯 - 斗 → 鬥 (not simplified for the meaning of "fight") - 读 → - 谏 → - 亚 → 亜 - 恶 → 悪 - 发 → 発 - 飞 → 𮨶 - 废 → 廃 - 无 → - 芜 → - 抚 → - 复 → 覄 - 关 → 𬮦 - 国 → 囯 - 划 → 㓰 - 开 → 𫔭 - 裤 → 衭 - 来 → 耒 - 丽 → 丽 - 卖 → - 泼 → 溌 - 让 → 誏 - 赛 → 𡧳 - 狮 → 𤞏 - 赎 → - 肃 → 粛 - 岁 → 𭭚 - 台 → 枱 (meaning "table") - 团 → - 萧 → 䔥 - 箫 → 簘 - 续 → - 杂 → - 职 → 聀 - 纸 → 帋 [Radicals](/wiki/Radical_(Chinese_character)) which are not simplified: - 纲 → 䋄 - 经 → - 练 → - 绳 → 䋲 - 线 → - 药 → 葯 - 绘 → 絵 - 继 → 継 - 织 → 𥿗 - 观 → 覌 - 觉 → 覚 - 览 → - 缆 → - 贱 → - 质 → 貭 - 颈 → - 饥 → 飢 - 讥 → 𮗸 - 讲 → 𮗻 - 识 → 䛊 - 译 → - 议 → - 证 → 証 - 鸡 → 鳮 - 骄 → - 验 → - 钱 → - 铁 → 鉄 - 钟 → 鈡 - [Singaporean Mandarin](/wiki/Singaporean_Mandarin) - [Languages of Singapore](/wiki/Languages_of_Singapore) - [Simplified Chinese characters](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters) - *[Shinjitai](/wiki/Shinjitai)*, for the specific forms of simplified Chinese characters used in Japan - [Variant Chinese characters](/wiki/Variant_Chinese_characters) (or *itaiji*)
